resources.string: Discover top destinations and book exclusive tours to explore the nature and culture of Almaty.
Find the best hotels and book exciting tours to experience the true hospitality of Almaty.
Immerse yourself in the majestic mountains and vibrant city life of Kazakhstans cultural capital.
Stay updated with real-time currency rates and easily calculate exchanges for your trip.

Shymbulak Resort is the largest ski resort in Kazakhstan, located in the scenic Ile-Alatau mountains near Almaty. It offers modern ski lifts, well-maintained slopes, and stunning panoramic views. In winter, it is a popular destination for skiing and snowboarding, while in summer visitors enjoy hiking and mountain activities. The resort sits at an altitude of over 2,200 meters above sea level. It is one of the most famous tourist attractions in the country.

Kok Tobe Hill is a well-known viewpoint located on the outskirts of Almaty. Visitors can reach the top by cable car, enjoying breathtaking views of the city and surrounding mountains. At the summit, there are restaurants, souvenir shops, and a small amusement park. It is also home to the famous Beatles monument. Kok Tobe is especially beautiful in the evening when the city lights shine below.

Big Almaty Lake is a stunning alpine lake situated about 15 kilometers south of Almaty. It is famous for its bright turquoise water, which changes color depending on the season. The lake lies at an altitude of approximately 2,500 meters above sea level. Surrounded by mountain peaks, it offers spectacular natural scenery. It is a popular destination for nature lovers and photographers.

Charyn Canyon is often compared to the Grand Canyon because of its dramatic rock formations. It is located about 200 kilometers east of Almaty. The canyon stretches for over 150 kilometers along the Charyn River. Its most famous section is the "Valley of Castles," known for unique and colorful rock shapes. Charyn Canyon is one of Kazakhstan\'s most impressive natural landmarks.

Almaty Central Mosque is one of the largest mosques in Kazakhstan. It is located near the Green Bazaar in the center of Almaty. The mosque was opened in 1999 and can accommodate up to 7,000 worshippers at a time. Its white marble walls and large golden dome make it very impressive. Today, it is an important religious and cultural center for Muslims in the city.

Medeu Rink is a high-altitude outdoor ice skating rink located in the mountains near Almaty. It sits at 1,691 meters above sea level, making it one of the highest skating rinks in the world. Medeu is famous for hosting international speed skating competitions and setting world records. In winter, both professionals and visitors come to skate here. The surrounding mountain landscape makes it a unique and beautiful sports venue.

Green Bazaar is one of the oldest and most popular markets in Almaty. It is the perfect place to experience local culture and traditional Kazakh cuisine. Visitors can buy fresh fruits, vegetables, meat, spices, and national sweets. The market is lively and colorful, attracting both locals and tourists. It offers a true taste of everyday life in Almaty.

A stunning wooden Orthodox church located in Panfilov Park. It is one of the tallest wooden buildings in the world and a symbol of Almaty. Built without nails, the cathedral features colorful architecture and is surrounded by the Eternal Flame and 28 Panfilov heroes memorial.

One of the largest museums in Central Asia, showcasing the history and culture of Kazakhstan. The museum houses archaeological finds, ethnographic collections, and exhibits from ancient times to the present day. The building itself is an architectural landmark with a distinctive blue dome.

Green Bazaar is one of the oldest and most authentic markets in Almaty. Visitors can find fresh fruits, spices, traditional Kazakh products, and local delicacies. It is a vibrant place where tourists can experience the true atmosphere of the city. The market is located near Panfilov Park and is a must-visit cultural spot.

Esentai Mall is a premium shopping destination in Almaty featuring international luxury brands, fine dining restaurants, and a modern cinema. It offers a high-end shopping experience in a stylish and comfortable environment. The mall is popular among tourists and locals seeking quality leisure time.

Dostyk Plaza is a modern shopping center offering a wide range of international brands, cafes, and a cinema complex. Its contemporary design and convenient location make it a popular destination for shopping and entertainment in Almaty.

Mega Center Almaty is one of the largest shopping malls in the city. It offers numerous shops, restaurants, a cinema, and entertainment areas for families. It is a popular destination for both shopping and weekend leisure activities.

Forum Almaty is a stylish shopping and lifestyle center located in the heart of the city. It features fashion stores, restaurants, cafes, and entertainment facilities. The mall combines urban design with a comfortable shopping atmosphere.

Asia Park is a convenient shopping center offering a variety of local and international stores. It is popular among residents for everyday shopping and casual entertainment. The mall provides a relaxed and accessible atmosphere.

Almaty Arena is a large modern sports and concert complex hosting international events, ice shows, and music concerts. It is one of the main entertainment venues in the city and attracts thousands of visitors.

The Palace of the Republic is one of Almaty’s most iconic concert halls. It hosts major cultural events, performances, and festivals. Located near Kok-Tobe, it is a key venue for national and international artists.

Auezov Kazakh Drama Theatre is one of the most prestigious cultural institutions in Kazakhstan. It presents classical and modern performances in the Kazakh language and plays a significant role in preserving national theatre traditions.
Issyk Lake is located in the Issyk Gorge and is known for its peaceful atmosphere and scenic mountain landscape. It is popular for day trips and picnics.
Kapchagay Reservoir is a popular summer destination with beaches, resorts, and water activities. It is perfect for swimming and relaxation.
Turgen Gorge is famous for its waterfalls, forests, and scenic hiking trails. It is a popular destination for outdoor lovers.
Tamgaly Tas is an open-air site featuring ancient Buddhist rock carvings along the Ili River. It combines природная красота and historical significance.
Panfilov Park is one of the most historic green spaces in Almaty. It is home to memorial monuments and is a popular place for walking and relaxation in the city center.
First President Park is a spacious and beautifully landscaped park with fountains, walking paths, and mountain views. It is popular for evening walks and public events.
Central Park of Culture and Leisure
Central Park is a large recreational area with a lake, amusement rides, спортивные площадки, and walking zones. It is one of the most visited parks in Almaty.
Almaty Botanical Garden features a diverse collection of plants, trees, and flowers. It is a peaceful place for прогулки and enjoying nature inside the city.
Japanese Garden is a small but beautiful landscaped park with traditional design elements, ponds, and quiet paths for relaxation.
Baum Grove is a natural forest zone within Almaty, offering shade, свежий воздух, and walking trails away from busy streets.
Fantasy World is an amusement park with rides and entertainment attractions suitable for children and adults.
Almaty Zoo hosts a wide variety of animals and offers educational programs for visitors. It is a popular destination for families with children.
Halyk Arena is a modern sports complex that hosts ice skating, хоккей games, and large public events.
Baiken Mosque is known for its elegant modern design and calm atmosphere. It is a popular place for prayer and quiet reflection.
Nur Mubarak Mosque is located near the Islamic University and combines traditional Islamic design with educational significance.
St. Nicholas Cathedral is an important православный church in Almaty, known for its traditional architecture and peaceful courtyard.
Ascension Cathedral is a remarkable wooden cathedral built without nails. It represents one of the finest examples of Orthodox architecture in Central Asia.
The Central State Museum showcases Kazakhstan’s history, culture, and археологические artifacts from ancient to modern times.
This museum presents a rich collection of traditional Kazakh musical instruments and cultural heritage exhibits.
Kasteev State Museum of Arts is the largest art museum in Kazakhstan, featuring national and international fine art collections.

Experience world-class luxury in the heart of Almaty. The Rixos Almaty Hotel offers a unique combination of comfort and traditional Kazakh hospitality. Enjoy spacious rooms, premium dining options, and a state-of-the-art spa center.
A historic landmark in the heart of Almaty. Hotel Kazakhstan offers stunning views of the mountains and the city. Perfect blend of Soviet-era grandeur and modern comfort.
Modern international hotel in the central business district. Novotel offers comfortable rooms, fitness center, and easy access to shopping and entertainment.
Modern 4-star hotel in the heart of Almaty. Comfortable rooms, restaurant and fitness center. City views and convenient location popular with tourists.
Resort hotel near Medeu. Mountain views, pool and spa. Perfect choice for relaxation.
Wellness resort in the Alatau mountains. Spa, pool and natural surroundings. Ideal for stress relief.
Eco-style resort hotel. National yurts, clean air and nature. For eco-travel lovers.
Luxury 5-star hotel at the foot of the Alatau mountains. Spa, pool and panoramic views. Elite retreat.
Hotel at Shymbulak mountain resort. Close to the ski lift, spa and mountain views. Popular in winter and summer.
5-star business hotel in the center, close to the mountains. Conferences, fitness and high-quality service.
